name: Football Management RPG Free
description:
**12-08-11 1st in Paid RPG charts in uk AppStore**

As Featured in 4-4-2 magazine, November 2011 issue.

'Football Management RPG is a pretty fascinating concept to explore....bypassing all the statistical nonsense and focusing purely on keeping people happy through the power of successful decision making... as a form of management title with a twist, it's a lot of fun.' - 148Apps.com

'Football Management RPG hits something that's as much a part of modern football as the game itself: the constantly baiting hacks, the irritating ex-pro on telly talking about tactics, the wags, the shady cover-ups and the training ground bust-ups.' - Edge Magazine

'every now and then there is one game that appears and notice should be taken of it.....It’s easy to pick up, not the least bit infuriating and when you get into it, just that little bit addictive as well.' - game dot.co.uk

An original new kind of football manager game that offers a completely different experience.

FMRPG is not about comparing statistics for players to see who is 'better', or playing an unrealistic and flawed transfer system.

It is about dealing with the personalities of your players, your staff and the media effectively in order to motivate them and deliver success on the pitch. Your decisions will affect your clubs harmony, attitude and tactics, which in turn will affect the outcome of your matches and results.

First you must choose your manager class which will depend on your personality type and your history within the game. Will you be a passionate ex-player from the lower leagues, an intelligent scholar of the game or an ex-international player who has the human touch?

How would you deal with a player in poor form and lacking confidence?

An agent demanding a massive new contract for your striker?

The chairman wanting to bring in a director of football?

A rival manager attacking your team through the media?

or a report from your scout suggesting your next opposition play a very deep defensive line?

Choose pre-match tactics, make half time changes and a team-talk to motivate your players to success.

As your manager gains experience and levels up, your skills will increase and you will gain greater ability in Man Management, Vision and Passion.

- Load/Save game
- Over 350 scenarios to negotiate (more to follow with updates)
- Over 25 separate personalities within the game
- 9 Character classes to play as from Tactician to Motivator
- In game tutorial to get you started
- Game video at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bo4b7w1S9TY
- Original hand-drawn artwork by agung setya nugraha
- Play music from your iPod library while playing the game
